full_text: The @RedSox beat the Tigers 9-7. Nathan Eovaldi picks up the win. Hansel Robles gets the save. @JackieBradleyJr had 3 RBI and @kikehndez added 2 more. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Austin Meadows gets hit by a pitch with the bases loaded for the Tigers. @RedSox lead is cut to 9-7 in the 8th. Nightmare inning for Boston.
Victor Reyes singles in a run for the Tigers. The @RedSox are now in danger of squandering the lead. 9-6 Boston with the bases loaded in the 8th. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Eric Haase single in a run for the Tigers. @RedSox lead is cut to 9-5 in the bottom of the 8th inning. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Spencer Torkelson hits a 2-run home run for the Tigers. @RedSox lead is cut to 5 at 9-4 in the bottom of the 7th inning. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Akil Baddoo hits a solo home run for the Tigers. @RedSox still lead 7-2 in the 5th inning. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Jonathan Schoop hits a solo home run in for the Tigers. @RedSox fall behind 1-0 headed to the 2nd inning in Detroit. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Jonathan Schoop singles in another run for the Tigers. Javy Baez follows with a double to bring him in. @RedSox now trail 3-0 in the 3rd inning. #RedSox #DirtyWater
The Tigers score a run on a groundout by Robbie Grossman. @RedSox will once again play from behind, down 1-0 in the 3rd inning. #RedSox #DirtyWater
Would love it if the Sox got a hit the first time through the lineup at some point.
